description.@en: With . . . every . . . damned . . . wound . . . I . . . only . . . grow . . . stronger!.

effect.@en: Whenever you are Hurt add +1 to Total Damage. If Moderately Wounded, add +2. If Seriously Wounded, add +3, and if Grievously Wounded, add +4 to Total Damage. You must be using a melee weapon to take advantage of this Talent.
